title: What is "Office" in "Accounts" list on my Pixel phone?
content:
I am trying to have Google Calendar show me my Hotmail calendar items - Microsoft removed Exchange support from their Hotmail service recently (March 2021) and since then I have had to re-add my Hotmail accounts as IMAP which does not then synchronise my contacts and calendar items.

Having just received a software update I thought I would go and try again - so I go to Settings > Accounts > Add account and in the list there is an new account type "Office" with a Microsoft Office-like logo, thought I would give it a try, I tap it and the screen shifts around a little then goes back to the list of accounts and now I have an entry "Office" with type "Office" - I didn't have to provide any account details or anything. So now I tap it and it tells me "Sync off for all items" but I cannot change that.

What is this account type and has it got anything to do with being able to access my Hotmail calendar from the Google calendar app?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
